Package agents.bayesianopponentmodel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BayesianOpponentModel
    Implementation of the unscalable Bayesian Model.
    BayesianOpponentModelScalable
    Implementation of the scalable Bayesian Model.
    EvaluatorHypothesis  
    Hypothesis  
    OpponentModel  
    OpponentModelUtilSpace  
    PerfectBayesianOpponentModelScalable
    Version of the standard Scalable Bayesian Model which uses the opponent's utilityspace to calculate the real utility of the opponent's bid.
